transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Good evening ma'am. Ji main, good afternoon ma'am. Main Ashutosh baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se. Dhanyavaad aapka.
Customer: Ji boliye.
Executive: Haan haan. Actually meri baat subah hui thi sir se hui thi garden lighting ke liye. To unhone galti se vaise mujhe call kar diya tha to usse concern raise ho gaya tha. To mera uske regarding call tha. To unhone haan, unhone fir bataya tha ki aap handle kar rahe hain isme.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: To abhi aisa koi major concern nahi hai na abhi to? Major koi concern regarding services and business?
Customer: Nahi sir.
Executive: Aisa bhi koi aisa concern nahi hai?
Customer: Nahi sir.
Executive: Achha, ek minute main abhi check kar leta hu. Itni mehnat karni hai mere sath baith ke.
Customer: Theek, theek hai.
Executive: Aur abhi haan. Ji ji. Abhi business, haan business sahi aa raha hai na matlab business ko?
Customer: Thoda theek thaak aa raha hai.
Executive: Haan haan haan. Isko kuch garden lights ke aap woh badha dijiye na.
Executive: Haan haan wohi wohi main yaad aaya. Abhi maine note down bhi kiya tha. Ek minute main bata deta hu. Sir ne mujhe bataya tha jo jo major mein deal karte hain na, woh hoti hai ek to decorative light aur ek garden lights. Hai na?
Customer: Haan ji. Haan ji. Yahi to hai. Haan haan to main inko bata deta hu aapko abhi. Inme kya karna hai ki main thoda aapko easy way mein samjha bhi deta hu ki IndiaMART ka jo algorithm hota hai na woh pura depend karta hai ki jaise jo bhi user hai na hamare, jo seller hai hamare client hai woh isko kaise use kar rahe hain. Haan ji.
Executive: Matlab easy way mein samjhata hu. Jaise Instagram ki reels hoti hai na aap jis tarah ki reel dekhenge aapko us tarah ka content suggest hona chalu ho jayega. Theek hai na? Hmm hmm.
Executive: Jo aap content consume karenge vaise aapko reward back milna chalu ho jayega algorithm se. Kyunki yaha par kafi sare clients hote hain na to iska bhi algorithm bilkul same hai. Isme kya hai ki aap jis tarah ki lead jyada consume karenge na us us type ki category mein lead aana chalu ho jayegi. Jaise ki main batata hu. Jaise sabse jyada aapki jo category hai na solar street light pole, iski lead jyada consume hui hai. To mainly aap dekh bhi rahe honge ki jo lead aa rahi hogi na isse thodi jyada aa rahi hogi. Haan ji.
Executive: Hai na? Aur ek cheez aur main dekh leta hu. Haan unhone jo concern bataya tha decorative light. Yeh tha na ki isme jyada deal business karte hain decorative light mein. Haan ji.
Executive: Haan actually isme kya hai na decorative lights ki last six month mein na lead thodi less consume hui hai. Isliye iski aapko kam bhi aa rahi hogi lead. Aur aapne jo bataya tha dusra garden. Okay. Main ek baar dekh leta hu. Ek minute line pe rahiye.
Customer: Main aapko 15-20 minutes mein call karu sir?
Executive: Ek minute main feedback bhi submit karna hai. Main woh kar dunga. Ek minute rukiye bas ek main do teen suggestion leta hu fir main aapko vapas call back kar lunga.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Koi issue nahi main call back kar lunga. Abhi bas do teen ek baar main bata bhi deta hu taki aapko bhi yaad rahe leads ke name. Sorry category ke name. Ek minute maine note down kiya tha ek minute line pe rahiye. Haan ek yeh thi garden pole light.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji sir.
Executive: Haan haan ek baar mujhe thoda bata dijiye main aapko taki jab 15 minute baad call karu na vapas se main call karu.
Customer: Garden pole light ki na lead jyada chahiye.
Executive: Haan lead jyada chahiye to main iska suggestion de deta hu ki garden pole lights ki aap hai na lead thoda consume karna chalu kariye jyada consume karenge na to aapko directly ultimately na jyada leads aane lagengi. Dusra ek iska to vaise bhi garden lead lights ki aapko leads abhi jyada hi aayegi kyunki yeh hai na top preferred category mein aa hi raha hai. Ek baar mujhe product confirm kar dijiye yahi hai na isme? Ek to 15 volt decorative garden pole lights aur 16 volt decorative. Haan yeh aapke primary aur secondary mein aata hai garden post top pole. Okay. Haan ji. Yeh secondary mein hai. Haan iski to aapko jyada hi aayegi aur dusra decorative light jo hai na isme bhi aapko jyada chahiye na decorative light ke liye sir bata rahe the. Haan ji.
Executive: Haan to kaam karega decorative lights ka isme kya karega jab kabhi bhi aapko time mile daily basis pe at least do do do buylead aap hai na daily basis pe karna decorative lights ki category search karke usko consume karna matlab contact buyer se connect kar lena decorative lights se. To isse benefit main bata deta hu kya hoga. Ki aapko hai na jaise aapne do do consume kari ultimately aur ek kaam aur karega jo aapki past lead rehti hai na vaha par bhi decorative lights ko I am interested kar dijiyega. Jo aapki purani lead rehti hai na jaha aap dekh paati hai. Haan ji.
Executive: Haan haan aap portal pe dekh paate honge past lead ka section aata hai vaha par agar koi lead aapse miss ho jati hai na ya woh lapse ho jati hai aapne consume nahi kar paaye to usme jaake I am interested kar dijiyega. Usse kya hoga ki main bata deta hu yeh main kyun keh raha hu usse jo hamara algorithm hai usko signal jayega ki hamare jo seller hai na woh decorative lights mein interested hai aur deal jyada kar rahe hain. To do cheez karega decorative lighting ki lights ki buyleads consume karna chalu kar dijiyega aur I am interested mark kar dijiyega. Aur main aur dekh leta hu. Baki jo flow aa raha hai woh to call ka jo flow aa raha hai flow street lights solar street lights isme to achha hi aa raha hoga hai na ma'am? Haan ji. Theek hai sir main aapko 10 minute mein phone karti hu haan. Ek minute haan ek minute rukiye bas main feedback bhi submit kar deta hu fir aapke paas isi number pe ya sir ke paas hai na ek feedback ka form aayega. Usko submit kar dijiyega usme yes kar dijiyega ek option rahega kyunki concern raise ho gaya tha na isliye haan woh concern close karane ke liye call kiya tha. Baki main aapko call karunga 10 minute baad usme koi issue nahi hai main aapko dikha dunga category kaun kaun si hoti hai. Theek hai sir.
Executive: Theek hai ma'am? Ek feedback aayega usko submit kar dijiyega ya sir ko bhi bata dijiyega mere paas feedback aayega. Abhi to major to koi concern hai nahi main par fir bhi call back karke ek suggestion de dunga hai na ma'am? Theek hai sir. Theek hai main concern close kar du na fir? Hello.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs more leads for garden pole lights.

- Decorative lights lead consumption is less.



Resolution:

- Suggested consuming more leads for garden pole lights.

- Advised marking decorative lights as 'Interested' in past leads.

- Explained how IndiaMART algorithm works.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back in 10 minutes.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, decorative lights, garden pole lights, algorithm
